name: Duelist Mod
description:
A Slay the Spire adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh!

SOURCE
 https://github.com/adambennett/StS-DuelistMod 

PATCH NOTES
v1.176.0
- Added 4 new cards: Petit Moth, Cocoon of Evolution, Cheerful Coffin, The Creator
- Added 1 new special card: Great Moth
- Great Moth can only be generated via Cocoon of Evolution
- Gaia Dragon Champ, Pumpking, Pumprincess logic improvements
- Added tribute canUse() logic to new tribute cards (to prevent them from being playable without the required number of tributes)

v1.172.0
- Made Monster Reborn real dope
- Added 1 new card: Tribute to Doomed
- Ookazi and Fissure now apply powers correctly, other random damage effect cards will be addressed in a future build
- Winged Dragon of Ra now has a (temporarily) very clear damage effect
- Millennium Ring now works properly



Thanks for playing the Duelist! Please let me know if you have any feedback or bug reports!
Email: nyoxidestsmods@gmail.com
Discord: Nyoxide#3464
